1: I joyfully sing and praise with all my heart.
2: I rise early to play joyful music.
3: I celebrate and share joy among everyone around me.
4: Your boundless kindness and truth inspire me to rise high.
5: I celebrate and honor the greatness of God everywhere.
6: I ask for help to deliver my beloved with strength.
7: I celebrate abundance and share my blessings with joy.
8: I embrace my strength and guidance from my community.
9: I achieve victory and success over my challenges.
10: I find my path to strength and guidance.
11: God guides us as we move forward together.
12: I find strength in support during challenging times.
13: Together, we achieve greatness with unwavering support.
